name: Last Night (akuna, Vacantusername, MARROW, Rowgue)
description:
Run for your life as you attempt to stand your ground against an unknown horror. 

Make sure to press the full screen button for best experience and to fix the UI issues!

How to Play

Run and jump, whilst shooting at the horror and other potential dangers within the forest. Once you reach the safe room, collect your upgrades and move on quickly, the horror regenerates once you leave its realm. 

Last Night

Last Night is a single boss fight 2d Platformer. In Last Night you play as a kid whose dreams are haunted. To survive the night, you must defend yourself against a nightmare and combat the horror that lurks within. To succeed, you are tasked to defeat the horrific creature that will pursue you. As you combat the nightmare, you must stay on edge as correct positioning, timing, and reactions are key to success. Be wary as time is limited and if you fail the nightmare will repeat. 

Challenge: Boss 

Theme: On The Edge 

This game was made in Unity for the VimJam2: Boss

Controls

A & D to move

Space to Jump

Left mouse click to Shoot

Double tap A or D to Dash (Must unlock via Safe Room reward)

W to aim up and S to aim down
